foreignData.name: Prophezeiung
foreignData.text: Zeige allen Spielern die oberste Karte der Bibliothek eines Gegners Deiner Wahl. Wenn es ein Land ist, erhältst Du einen Lebenspunkt dazu. Dieser Gegner mischt danach seine Bibliothek. Ziehe eine Karte während der nächsten Versorgungsphase.

name: Prophecy
originalText: Reveal the top card of target opponent's library to all players. If it is a land, gain 1 life. That opponent then shuffles his or her library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

rulings.text: The shuffling and drawing of a card next upkeep happens even if the card is not a land.

text:
Reveal the top card of target opponent's library. If it's a land, you gain 1 life. Then that player shuffles.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
